question: We asked 100 people, name a house you never want to be in. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 married men, name something in a bakery a baker might call his wife. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 women, name an occasion for which you might wear lingerie. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 women, what word can be used instead of “woman”. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 men, what is something you’d do to your armpit. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 people, name something that’s served both hot and cold. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 people, name something people take out. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 men, name something a football fan would wear to the stadium. Choose the top answer.
We asked 100 kids, name a Marvel Avenger. Choose the top answer.
